original_text: Mikloth became the father of Shimeah. They lived near their relatives in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 미글롯은 시므아를 낳았으며 그들은 친족들과 더불어 마주하고 예루살렘에 거주하였더라

sentences.original_text: Mikloth became the father of Shimeah.
They lived near their relatives in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예루살렘에서 그들의 친척들과 가까이 살았다.
